page.title: 14CLUBS
page.content: IN BOZEAT,THERE ARE TWO BROWNIE PACKS, AND ONE GUIDE,ONE CUBS AND ONE SCOUT TROOP.THE BROWNIES MEET EVERY THURSDAY AT 6p.m.AT BROWNIES YOU PLAY GAMES.IT COSTS 20p A SESSION,WHICH GOES TOWARDS BADGES.AT BROWNIES YOU HAVE PATROL TIME WHICH IS WHEN YOU GO INTO A CORNER AND WORK.ONE PACK MEETS AT THE CHURCH HALL AND THE OTHER AT SCHOOL.THE GUIDES MEET EACH MONDAY AT THE SCHOOL.YOU PLAY GAMES LIKE ROUNDERS AND TRY FOR BADGES. YOU CAN ALSO GO CAMPING. THE SCOUT TROOP HAS 21 MEMBERS AND MEETS ON MONDAYS AT THE METHODIST CHURCH.THE CUBS ALSO MEET THERE EARLIER THE SCOUTS HAVE MANY ACTIVITIES SUCH AS CANOEING,SWIMMING,NIGHT HIKES AND GAMES THE CUBS PLAY GAMES AND THEN WORK IN THEIR BOOKS LEARNING ABOUT KNOTS AMD FIRST AID.CUBS AND SCOUTS ALSO GO CAMPING.
